name: overconfidence
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being too certain of your abilities or of your chances of success: He cautioned against overconfidence. Good preparation can sometimes lead to overconfidence.
More examplesFewer examplesLet's not lose because of overconfidence.In his overconfidence he'd neglected some lab work.The danger for the campaign is they fall back into complacency and overconfidence.
